name: Sampling (itch)
description:
You are one sneaky blob, sampling others to survive in an ever changing world.

The Gameplay:

Sneak-Sample-Morph-Fight-Hinder-Rescue-Hide-Escape.

 Sneak/Fight your way through procedurally generated outposts/arenas to rescue the lost.

Sample others to gain the temporary ability to morph into them.

 Hinder your immortal opponents revival by rolling their 'Eye' away.

 Hide and dodge enemies by using the interactable/destructible environment to your advantage.

 Escape.

The Features:

A bunch of beings to sample, fight, and eavesdrop on.

 Infinite procedural outposts and arenas, each with their own unique setups.

 Local co-op gameplay, plug in a controller and sample and save as a duo.

 A dozen wonderful characters to unlock, each with their own challenge and skill.

 A variety of infusers, useful as temporary boosts or wells to pull a sample out of.

 Fluctuating, but ever increasing, difficulty with an absorbing blend of stealth and action.

 A story that sneaks up on you.
